data.title: Harris Admin: Delaying Weapons to Israel Undermines Our Ally, Accommodates Iran — U.S. Senator Tim Scott of South Carolina
data.meta_description: WASHINGTON — U.S. Senators Tim Scott (R-S.C.) and Tom Cotton (R-Ark.) today led nearly all of their Senate Republican colleagues in sending a letter to the Biden-Harris administration, protesting its partial arms embargo against Israel. The senators urged the White House to cease accommodating Iran, stop jeopardizing the lives of American servicemembers, and to deliver the necessary weapons systems to […]
